sentences.english: Indra worried that this powerful sage would one day want to usurp the position of king of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他擔心這位強有力的聖哲有一天會篡奪天帝的位置。

sentences.english: You have to thought of to work properly son, the throne should notification to work properly son now sky.
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有想到靈兒，現在天帝應該注意到靈兒了。

sentences.english: I was sent by the god, to rule all the animals.
sentences.chinese: 我是天帝派來管理百獸的。

sentences.english: Eating me, you will violate the command of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 你要吃了我，就違抗了天帝的命令。

sentences.english: His conducts of filial piety moved the King of Heaven.
By eating me, you will violate the command of Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 你要吃了我，就違抗了天帝的命令。

sentences.english: But for the theological poets Jove was no higher than the mountain peaks.
sentences.chinese: 但是照神學詩人們看，天帝約夫並不比山峯高。

sentences.english: Filled with admiration for Yugong, the Emperor of Heavens ordered two mighty gods to carry the mountains away.
sentences.chinese: 天帝佩服愚公的精神，就命兩位大力神揹走二山。

sentences.english: This battle emperor in the sky premeditates already a long time, how may give up.
sentences.chinese: 這場戰役天帝預謀已久，怎麼可能放棄。

sentences.english: I'm appointed by God as the King of the animal world.
sentences.chinese: 我是天帝派來的百獸之王。

definition: Dijun, Shang dynasty protector God, possibly same as legendary Emperor 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4]
Three Sovereigns, between Gods and Emperors in third millennium BC/usually listed as Suiren 燧人[Sui4 ren2], Fuxi 伏羲[Fu2 Xi1], trapping and writing, Shennong or Farmer God 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2]
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
Shengzu, temple name of the second Qing emperor, known as the Kangxi Emperor (1654-1722)/cf. 康熙[Kang1 xi1]
Xingtian, headless giant hero of Chinese mythology decapitated by the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4]
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals

Five Legendary Emperors, usually taken to be the Yellow Emperor 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] and four of his sons Zhuan Xu 顓頊|颛顼[Zhuan1 Xu1], Di Ku 帝嚳|帝喾[Di4 Ku4], Tang Yao 唐堯|唐尧[Tang2 Yao2], Yu Shun 虞舜[Yu2 Shun4]
